name: Monash Unit Planner
tagline: A Monash University Degree (Course) Planner built by Monash Students, for Monash Students
body:
# Monash Course Planner
Plan out your degree with **Monash Course Planner**. Monash University Course Planner is designed to help you to choose your units for the coming semesters. And takes account into prerequisites as well as prohibitions 

# Beta Access
To access the beta visit: https://monashunitplanner.github.io/Monash-Course-Planner/

# Site Design
![Screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/QmGI4WC.png)

# Current Features
- Modern site built with electron 
- Pure.css 

# Planned Features
- Takes account of prerequisites and prohibitions
- Plan for the future
- Add deferring semester blocks
- sql database updates from website crawling using python3 

# Dependancies List
- npm (node.js)
- electron
- Pure.css

- (sql.js)
- (python3)

_Database is currently stored as a sqlite db, this may be pushed onto a SQL Server in the near future_


# Usage
## Installation
This uses Electron, to install npm package type
```
sudo npm install
```
## Developement and Testing
To test simply run
```
npm start
```
This will run an electron instance

# To Join
You can join this project through many different ways
- make a fork and pull request changes
- Contact our administrators

# Contact
You can contact the following admins/devs 
- @lorderikir
